Eclectic Materia Medica bụ materia medika nke dọkịnta na-ahụ maka ọgwụ Harvey Wickes Felter dere (onye ya na John Uri Lloyd dere nke King's Amerikan Dispensatory)

Nke a bụ nke ikpeazụ, nke a na-akọwapụta, mana n'ikpeazụ, mgbalị na'efu iji gbochie oke ọgwụ Standard Practice, ihe na ya megidere ihe nlereanya nke onye dọkịta na - "vitalist" nke na maọbụ ihe ndabere maka ọgwụ Eclectic.   Enwere ike ịchọta akụkụ ahịhịa nke Materia Medika na ebe nrụọrụ weebụsaiti dị n'okpuru ebe a, mana akwụkwọ ahụ nwekwara alkaloids, nnu, kemịkal, ihe ndị a na-etinye na ngwaahịa ndị ọzọ n"èzí nke ala ahụhị.
